873650.name: Fantasy Grounds - Paths to Adventure: Underworld Mega-Dungeons (Map Pack)
873650.description:
Paths to Adventure: Underworld Mega-Dungeons Map Pack

This collection of maps custom is built for the Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop and includes 10 incredible maps related to the Underworld for use in your campaign. Both GM and Player maps are included.
The Underworld Mega-Dungeons map pack is one of an eight-part collection by Paths to Adventure cartography, usable in any game system.
You will find the following maps in this pack:
  • MAP 058: Underworld Mega-Dungeon 1
  • MAP 069: Underworld Mega-Dungeon 2
  • MAP 091: Underworld Mega-Dungeon 3
  • MAP 125: Underworld Mega-Dungeon 4
  • MAP 222: Underworld Mega Dungeon 5
  • MAP 223: Underworld Mega-Dungeon 6
  • MAP 224: Underworld Mega-Dungeon 7
  • MAP 225: Underworld Mega Dungeon 8
  • MAP 226: Underworld Mega Dungeon 9
  • MAP 227: Underworld Mega-Dungeon 10
Cartography by:
Justin Andrew Mason
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Trevor Armstrong, and Justin Mason
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
